#summary Release history of svg-edit

= Introduction =

This page describes past versions of svg-edit.  For the future, see Roadmap.

= Version 2.1 ==
== Approved Features ==
== New Features Added ==
 * tooltips added to all UI elements
 * edit of fill opacity, stroke opacity, group opacity
 * selection of elements
 * move/drag of elements
 * save SVG file to separate tab
 * create and edit text elements
 * contextual panel of tools
 * change rect radius, font-family, font-size
 * keystroke handling
== Dates ==
 * Released - Jun 17, 2009
 * Demo URL - http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/2.1/svg-editor.html

= Version 2.0 ==
== New Features Added ==
 * draw ellipse, square
 * change stroke-dasharray (line style)
 * rearranged whole code to OOP
 * GUI enhancement
== Dates ==
 * Released - Jun 03, 2009
 * Demo URL - http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/2.0/svg-editor.html
 * Related Revision - http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/source/detail?r=24

= Version 1.0 ==
== New Features ==
 * draw path, line, freehand-circle, rect
 * clear drawn image
 * delete element
 * save image
== Dates ==
 * Released - Feb 13, 2009
 * Demo URL - http://svg-edit.googlecode.com/svn/branches/1.0/svg-editor.html
 * Related Revision - http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/source/detail?r=9
